speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Adam Gierek, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on putting knowledge into practice: A broad-based innovation strategy for Europe [ 2006/2274(INI) ] ( A6-0159/2007 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Adam Gierek, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on putting knowledge into practice: A broad-based innovation strategy for Europe [ 2006/2274(INI) ] ( A6-0159/2007 ).
